error.message: Using the '.*' form of import should be avoided - java.sql.*.
Variable 'connection' must be private and have accessor methods.
Variable 'sqlSelectSortedPage' must be private and have accessor methods.
Variable 'sqlInsert' must be private and have accessor methods.
Variable 'sqlUpdate' must be private and have accessor methods.
Variable 'sqlSelectFilteredEntities' must be private and have accessor methods.
Variable 'sqlDelete' must be private and have accessor methods.
Method 'getSortedEntitiesPage' is not designed for extension - needs to be abstract, final or empty.
Method 'getFilteredEntitiesPage' is not designed for extension - needs to be abstract, final or empty.
Method 'createEntity' is not designed for extension - needs to be abstract, final or empty.
Method 'updateEntity' is not designed for extension - needs to be abstract, final or empty.
Method 'deleteEntity' is not designed for extension - needs to be abstract, final or empty.
